Grain.Do: Quinoa (1/2 cup cooked), Brown Rice (1/2 cup cooked), Oats (1/3 cup dry, cooked with water) - focus on gluten-free and whole grains.
Grain.Dont: White rice, refined flour products, refined pasta.

Legume.Do: Lentils (1/2 cup cooked), Mung Dal (1/2 cup cooked), Chickpeas (1/2 cup cooked) - well-cooked and spiced.
Legume.Dont: Heavier beans like kidney beans, black beans in large quantities.

Veg.Do: Cooked vegetables: Asparagus (1 cup), Zucchini (1 cup), Sweet Potato (1/2 cup), Broccoli (1 cup) - steamed or lightly sautéed.
Veg.Dont: Raw, cold, or cruciferous vegetables in excess, nightshades like tomatoes and peppers in large amounts if sensitive.

Spices.Do: Turmeric (1/2 tsp), Ginger (1/2 inch fresh), Cumin (1/2 tsp), Coriander (1/2 tsp), Cinnamon (1/4 tsp) - use generously to aid digestion and blood sugar balance.
Spices.Dont: Excessive chili, very pungent spices if not well-tolerated.

Leafy veg.Do: Cooked Spinach (1 cup), Kale (1 cup) - lightly sautéed or steamed.
Leafy veg.Dont: Large amounts of raw leafy greens.

Oil.Do: Ghee (1 tsp), Coconut Oil (1 tsp), Sesame Oil (1 tsp) - use in moderation for cooking.
Oil.Dont: Deep frying, excessive amounts of any oil.

Fruits.Do: Sweet fruits in moderation: Berries (1/2 cup), Apple (1 small, cooked or stewed), Pear (1 small, cooked or stewed).
Fruits.Dont: Sour fruits, dried fruits, overripe fruits, excessive quantities of any fruit.

Nuts and Dry fruits.Do: Almonds (4-6 soaked), Walnuts (2-3 halves) - in small, mindful quantities.
Nuts and Dry fruits.Dont: Large portions, dry roasted nuts without soaking, cashews in excess.

Milk product.Do: Warm Milk (1 cup with turmeric or cardamom) - if tolerated, otherwise consider plant-based alternatives like almond milk.
Milk product.Dont: Cold milk, ice cream, cheese, yogurt (especially sour varieties).

Non-veg.Do: Lean meats: Chicken breast (3-4 oz, baked or steamed), Fish (3-4 oz, baked or steamed) - focus on easily digestible options.
Non-veg.Dont: Red meat, fried meats, processed meats, excessive quantities.

Condiments.Do: Fresh ginger chutney (1 tsp), Fresh coriander chutney (1 tsp) - in moderation.
Condiments.Dont: Spicy pickles, vinegary sauces, sugar-laden condiments.
